comment.body:
The advertisement is blocked by List-KR filter and AdGuard Mobile Ad filter.
You can resolve your issue by the following instruction:
 1. Clear cache of KakaoTalk app.
 2. If 1st detail does not work, touch the advertisement for a while until advertisement option appears.
 2-1. Touch `Do not show this advertisement`.
 2-2. Any advertisement is no longer showed because AdGuard blocks such request.
 3. If 1st and 2nd details do not work, Please consider removing your 3rd-party filters except List-KR filter.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

그 광고는 List-KR 필터와 AdGuard 모바일 광고 필터로 차단되고 있습니다.
다음 방법으로 문제를 해결하실 수 있습니다:
  1. 카카오톡 앱의 캐시를 삭제해주세요.
  2. 첫번째 방법이 작동하지 않으면, 광고 옵션이 나올 때까지 광고를 터치하세요.
  2-1. '이 광고 보지 않기'를 누르세요.
  2-2. AdGuard가 그러한 요청을 차단하기 때문에 어떤 광고도 표시되지 않습니다.
  3. 민약 1번째과 2번째 방법이 작동하지 않으면, List-KR 필터를 제외한 제 3자 필터를 제거하는 것을 고려해주세요.

</details>

issue.title: www.poli-ground.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.poli-ground.com/index.php](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.poli-ground.com%2Findex.php) ### Comment > This annoyances appears only if you are logged in to the site, not if you are not logged in. > This annoyance pops up a small pop-up in the site and changes the background to a non-clickable black color. > I even succeeded in removing the pop-up by adding user rules, but I couldn't solve the screen changing to black that I couldn't click on. (poli-ground.com###layerTip > div.pop_layer_in:last-child > div.pop_con) > Only manually closing the pop-up can solve this phenomenon. > If closed manually, the website generates the cookies below and does not display the pop-up until the cookies expire. However, it is very cumbersome because the expiration date of cookies is set to 12 hours. > I forced the expiration date of the cookie myself and the phenomenon was resolved. > { > "domain": "www.poli-ground.com", > "expirationDate": 1673240395.736125, > "hostOnly": true, > "httpOnly": true, > "name": "tip_guide", > "path": "/", > "sameSite": "unspecified", > "secure": false, > "session": false, > "storeId": "0", > "value": "Y" > } ### Screenshots

So, I do not fix this issue.

comment.body: The prevent-setTimeout rule should be applied if and only if `#%#AG_onLoad(function(){let a=document.querySelectorAll("img+noscript");let ns=function(b){let f=new DOMParser();let g=f.parseFromString(b.textContent,'text/html');return document.adoptNode(g.querySelector('img'));};for(let b of a){let c=ns(b);b.parentNode.replaceChild(c,b);}});` is applied.

Unfortunately, I cannot check it out, because website requires account.
If issue occurs even with all modules disabled, then it's probably not caused by filters, so please contact with technical support - https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support

You can also try to add this rule:
```adblock
@@||creator.xiaohongshu.com^$document
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce ads with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update. Or reduce the number of third-party filters.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

Floating window can't be blocked. It does not change state when scrolling up.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Hi!
The issue is caused by `I don't care about cookies`. 
Please add `@@||h.seznam.cz/js/cmp2/scmp-consent.js` to User rules, or turn-off this filter.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://mail.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.ru) ### Comment > Проблема возникает на любых сайтах, но только в браузере Mozilla Firefox при включении в AdGuard https фильтрации. С отключенной фильтрацией проблемы нет, но и фильтрации рекламы почти нет :( > Проблема появилась после перехода на Windows 11. Пока работал на Windows 10 все было отлично. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
